---
title: "Post With Code and Plot"
author: "Ravi"
date: "2024-02-09"
categories: [news, code, analysis]
image: "image.jpg"
---

Let's see if blogging with code and plots works here!

::: {#9081c1e6 .cell execution_count=1}
``` {.python .cell-code}
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import numpy as np
x = np.linspace(0, 10, 100)

fig = plt.figure()
plt.plot(x, np.sin(x), '-')
plt.plot(x, np.cos(x), '--')
```
